name: Institute of Biomedical Laboratory Science-Laboratory Medicine
goal: The Institute of Biomedical Laboratory Science-Laboratory Medicine is a biomedical laboratory science professional association in the EU/UK. Its main aims are to educate and represent its members, promote Biomedical Laboratory Science to the public, enable career development and award qualifications to its members.
euInitiatives:
Recommendation on Key Competences for Lifelong Learning
European Credit system for Vocational Education and Training (ECVET)
EU lifelong-learning-policy
